title: New Scottish-made PINND CS2 Pedals with Titanium Axle have no rider weight limit
content:
PINND are a new Scottish componentry brand, launching with the CS2 Flat Pedal. Intended for downhill, enduro and e-MTB, we got eyes on the final production version of the PINND CS2 Pedals at the EWS, Tweed Valley. With a 5 year warranty period, PINND have focused on the pedalâ€™s strength and longevity, using oil sealed
